newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistani cotton yarn rates close unchanged.
newsitem.headline: Pakistani cotton yarn rates close unchanged.

text.p: Pakistani cotton yarn rates closed unchanged on Wednesday because of low demand from yarn-users and less buying orders from abroad, and are likely to remain stable in the next few days.
Following are the rates in rupees supplied by the Pakistan Yarn Merchants Association for 10-lb (4.54 kg) cone of 21 counts: Wednesday Jan 5
